publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-538 Iain Smith: Congratulations to Falkland—That the Parliament congratulates the village of Falkland on winning a prestigious gold award in the 2007 Entente Florale Europe and recognises the considerable effort by everyone in the community in achieving this European award and, in particular, the work of Falkland in Bloom for which this award comes as a fitting tribute for its work in this its 20th anniversary year. Supported by: Elizabeth Smith*, Ross Finnie*, Jim Tolson*
S3M-538 Congratulations to Falkland (lodged on 24 September 2007) Bill Kidd*, Robin Harper*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Stuart McMillan*, Patricia Ferguson*, Karen Gillon*

S3M-538 Iain Smith: Congratulations to Falkland—That the Parliament congratulates the village of Falkland on winning a prestigious gold award in the 2007 Entente Florale Europe and recognises the considerable effort by everyone in the community in achieving this European award and, in particular, the work of Falkland in Bloom for which this award comes as a fitting tribute for its work in this its 20th anniversary year. Supported by: Elizabeth Smith, Ross Finnie, Jim Tolson, Bill Kidd, Robin Harper, Hugh O’Donnell, Stuart McMillan, Patricia Ferguson, Karen Gillon
